
# Creditcall

## General 
 
**Code:** `creditcall` 
 
**Name:**

**Status:** `active` 
 
**Description:** 
 
: [EN]  Creditcall makes card acceptance simple from any device, anywhere. We develop the most secure and easy to integrate payment solutions that are relied on globally, whether in-store, mobile or online.
